All study participant undergo follow examination baseline : - CCTA - CAC-score - Transthoracic echocardiography - 12-lead ECG - Blood pressure pulse frequency - Height , weight , waist hip-ratio - Blood sample urin sample - Medical history After 12 month examination repeat .
